cheatsheet.title: Creation of a Simple Listing Report

intro.description: This tutorial helps you create a simple listing report using BIRT.

item.title: Create a Data Source
item.description:
- In the Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sources and choose New Data Source.
- Select Classic Models Inc. Sample Database.
- Choose Next.
- Choose Finish.

item.title: Create a Data Set
item.description:
- In the Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sets and choose New Data Set.
- On New Data Set, Choose Next.
- On Query, in Available Items, expand one or more tables in the ClassicModels database.
- To create a SQL query, drag column names from Available Items to the right pane to write the SELECT and FROM clauses, then choose Finish.

item.title: Bind the data to the table
item.description:
In the Data Explorer view, drag the fields for your table from DataSet to the table in the editor area. Drop each field in a cell in the Detail row of the table.
- To preview the output of the report, choose Preview.
